website_summaries.verdict: Great choice for first timers who don't want to invest a lot of money in at-home kits.
pros: Beloved by many who can't find higher-end kits in their hometowns
Bonus points for doubling as a hot water bottle
cons: Some who ordered the product online found that some parts were missing

customer_reviews.title: picture not accurate
customer_reviews.text: Bought a blue douch bag a while back because it matched my bathroom better. The hook holder ripped out, which makes it useless to me. The picture shown here looks like my old bag with reinforced hook holder. They sent me the same bag I just threw out, only in the color red!!! That is so annoying when that happens. Going to a drug store to find my good old fashioned bag
customer_reviews.author: Dianne

customer_reviews.title: Not a quality product
customer_reviews.text: This product has very stiff rubber. The hose was of low quality and the shut-off was so stiff to operate, it was nearly impossible to use. Also what was sent to me did not come close to matching the picture. It was a different product. Do not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Jet Mech 1

customer_reviews.title: Questionable Product
customer_reviews.text: This product smells like harmful chemicals. I had to clean with vinegar several times to ensure all the chemical was removed. I recommend doing a thorough cleaning before use.
customer_reviews.author: Blac Beauti

customer_reviews.title: Old School Water Bottle
customer_reviews.text: Just what I was looking for. Some reviews say there was a bad odor, but mine has none at all. Very quality product for what it is.
customer_reviews.author: Timothy A. Griswold

customer_reviews.title: so so water bottle
customer_reviews.text: Shipped on time, but I gotta be honest and say we're wondering how long this thing is going to last. Our old one--same brand--lasted about 10 years with frequent use in a family of 7. Cold water for warm nights, warm water for cold nights or illness. But this water bottle's rubber feels about half as thin and more plastic-like than the sturdy, thick yet pliable rubber of our old one. The tubing also feels cheaper / more plastic-like.. Time will tell, but it feels cheap.
customer_reviews.author: PLG

customer_reviews.title: Sometimes old school works best
customer_reviews.text: Sometimes old school works best. My parents had one of these. This product is multi functional. Hot water bottle and work better than the little Enema bottles.
customer_reviews.author: GEORGE

customer_reviews.title: As Stated
customer_reviews.text: This is good set and at an acceptable quality. The boxes were a little smashed in the shipping box, but the items were fine inside. All the pieces were accounted for and the bag was a medium mass produced grade rubber/latex type material. It is surprising this item is getting harder to find in local stores - even drug stores. Thank god for Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Tranquility

customer_reviews.title: Don't waist your money get a better quality and design
customer_reviews.text: There is no stopper or closer at the top, just hangs open. The clamp to pinch it off does not stay closed. This is not a user friendly item and is very awkward to even try to use. Don't waist your money get a better quality and design. As soon as a replacement arrives this one is going in the garbage.
customer_reviews.author: Sheaj

customer_reviews.title: enema bottle
customer_reviews.text: this is my 3rd. bottle from cara , because the first two were well made and the price was right...this one seems to be of less quality than the others. i am making do with it (no pun intened) but i am not happy with it. when this one wears out i will try once more to see if maybe they have gotten better and if not , i will just get a store bought- john
customer_reviews.author: john

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: We use this water bottle nightly to keep my wife's feel warm and increase circulation. Basically a simple device but well made and no Leaks from the bag or stopper.
customer_reviews.author: zx14hank

customer_reviews.title: Ok
customer_reviews.text: Woels as describe but got a small hole in it i dont know how
customer_reviews.author: Dream⭐

customer_reviews.title: I am very satisfied with this item
customer_reviews.text: I am very satisfied with this item. The price was very good also. I looked in my local drug stores it was $5 or more for the same item.The quality is good.I would purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Jeraldine Smith

customer_reviews.title: ENEMA USE
customer_reviews.text: THE BAG AND CLIP IS FINE BUT THE HOSE IS SO FLIMSY IT COLLASPED CONSTANTLY WHILE IN USE FOR ENEMA.... BIG HASSEL AND TIME CONSUMING. REPLACE THE HOSE AND YOU HAVE A GOOD PRODUCT.
customer_reviews.author: REBECCA MAXWELL

customer_reviews.title: Useless, inferior product
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this equipment to use in the Gershon regime for coffee enemas. This product is quite inferior in that the components cannot be assembled as produced by the factory. Evidently there are no quality controls enforced in the manufacture. A waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: redpen9

customer_reviews.title: good deal
customer_reviews.text: i have no complaints about this product, it works as it should. i'm pleased with my purchase. the only reason it didn't get 5 stars is my box was damaged, by damaged i mean smashed and not sealed.
customer_reviews.author: Cjames

customer_reviews.title: Cara personal hygiene water bottle was really good, and received on time
customer_reviews.text: Cara personal hygiene water bottle was really good, and received on time. But the external charger backup battery case has not been received since February 22nd.
customer_reviews.author: benjamin

customer_reviews.title: Excellent enema kit for the price
customer_reviews.text: Works very well; no frills; easy assembly and use. Have used this product for a couple of years. I highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Lesley

customer_reviews.title: Cara is the only one
customer_reviews.text: The Cara Water Bottle Combination is the only product of this kind that I have seen (and I have been looking all over) that isn't made of stinky, toxic smelling plastic that makes you wonder what is mixing with the water going into your vital places. Although it is smaller than I would like, one can still refill and continue on. Everything works well and is easy to clean, so you can get on with your day feeling just great.
customer_reviews.author: Sonrisa

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: I am not impressed because this system doesn"t work very long at all.
customer_reviews.author: sandra X

customer_reviews.title: Good Product
customer_reviews.text: The product was good and did what it promised. I also received it in a timey fashion.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle B.

customer_reviews.title: Replaces a 20 year old same product
customer_reviews.text: This item replaces the same product that we have had for 20 plus years. Coffee Cleanse keeps us clean and healthy
customer_reviews.author: Warm up north

customer_reviews.title: old-time remedy
customer_reviews.text: needed this for my 91 year old mother, who would not use anything else
customer_reviews.author: LYNDAHONEY

customer_reviews.title: This product works much better for me than other similar products on Amazon
customer_reviews.text: This product works much better for me than other similar products on Amazon.com. There are less small pieces to put together which has prevented dripping hose leaks I was getting with other brands. Having less pieces also makes it seem easier to keep clean. I highly recommend it. I will say, though, that every time I buy a replacement one of these, the materials used to make the bag and hose seem to have gotten more flimsy. It still works well, though.
customer_reviews.author: Reviewer22

customer_reviews.title: This this is great. I just could not find this anywhere then ...
customer_reviews.text: This this is great. I just could not find this anywhere then I thought "Try Amazon!" and there it was. I like it!
customer_reviews.author: Theresa S

customer_reviews.title: it is great quality, the bag and tubing is soft
customer_reviews.text: it is great quality, the bag and tubing is soft, not the hard smelly plastic I've noticed in other brands
customer_reviews.author: nobody special

customer_reviews.title: Good product. Well made
customer_reviews.text: Yep. Good product. Well made. Last Long Time. Saves Money. Would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: A.J & Tammy Moscato

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic
customer_reviews.text: quality is very good, especially for the tube. very easy to use, much better than I can imagine highly recommened!
customer_reviews.author: B. Z

product_meta.title: CARA Douche & Enema Combination Kit
product_meta.description: This natural rubber hot or cold water bottle works effectively to remedy aches, pains and sports injuries. The screw stopper provides a quality seal with no leakage. For over 15 years, Cara has been dedicated to providing the consumer with quality, cost-effective products. Consumers have come to recognize the name Cara for value. Cara provides a broad line of reliable, high-quality, and economical Home Healthcare products with manufacturer warranty to provide complete consumer satisfaction.
feature_bullets: Multi-purpose kit; fill with hot water to remedy aches or for enema and douche procedures
Includes attachments for both enema and douche; helps relieve multiple conditions
Made from natural premium rubber; retains heat for an extra long time and conforms to your body
Secure screw top stopper ensures no leaking; measures 7 inches by 14 inches; holds 2 quarts
Comes with 10 year manufacturer's limited warranty; easy to clean with vinegar, baking soda or warm water

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Currently, item can be shipped only within the U.S. and to APO/FPO addresses. For APO/FPO shipments, please check with the manufacturer regarding warranty and support issues.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S.
